products.title: Carlotta, Blossom - Roman Blind
products.description: An intricate weave of pretty florals and weaves, the carlotta in blossom features rich shades of pink alongside sunny yellows and leafy greens. The look is classic, yet contemporary enough that it would work in a variety of homes and dcor schemes. Use the blossom to bring your hallway or landing to life. This gorgeous roman blind can be your walkway's key feature, taking centre stage amidst similar pinks and rich creams.

products.title: Carlotta, Pebble - Roman Blind
products.description: The stylish light grey acts as the perfect canvas for the flourish of natural colours that make up carlotta pebble. The vibrancy of the pinks and reds is matched by the vitality of the greens and yellows to create a stunning visual that is a treat for your eyes. Dress the living room to impress with the inspired choice of carlotta pebble. Add in a matching lampshade and a set of scatter cushions to create a theme that welcomes you in without overpowering your senses.

products.title: Carlotta, Wisteria - Roman Blind
products.description: Looking pretty is what the carlotta wisteria does best, and these richly colourful blossoms are here to prove it. Lilacs, mauves, and blues are wonderfully offset by greens and yellows, forming an elaborate knot of florals that will add character to any home. Mix the wisteria with matching mauves in a bedroom or living room, opting for a light and airy look that will feel like summer all year round.

products.title: Coco, Autumn - Roman Blind
products.description: The coco in autumn blends smooth and silky texturing with soft autumnal colours for a beautifully three-dimensional feel. A creamy biscuit background is host to large, patterned leaves displaying fine stitching and in gorgeously golden mustard, bronze, and ivory tones, with hints of red thrown in for added depth. Use the autumn to display a classically cosy look in a living room or den, setting it amongst rich creams and golden browns in the form of walls, floors, and furniture.

products.title: Coco, Green - Roman Blind
products.description: Offering a natural yet contemporary look, the coco in green is the ideal choice for an understated look in a modern home. The palest of greens and a pretty stone grey sit on top of a green-hued oatmeal background, with the leaf illustrations only serving to accentuate this natural style. The green will work perfectly in a kitchen that gets plenty of natural light - but even if it doesn't, this blind's light tones will help to preserve what light you have.

products.title: Hollihocks, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: The gorgeous shades of navy, teal, and pink in the stunningly country-style hollihocks navy stand out beautifully against the pale background and olive green accents. With it's linen-feel woven fabric, this roman blind is the perfect addition to a more rural setting. Pair the navy with country cream or palest blue walls in the kitchen or dining room for a fresh garden style. Use the vibrant colours of the fabric to choose accenting accessories in various shades, from placemats to utensils.

products.title: Oasis, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: The oasis charcoal is a beautiful hybrid of abstract patterning and colourful foliage. Mauves and blues meet alongside rich charcoal, surrounded by a cool off-white tone. The blind has an ethereal quality that would look stunning in both contemporary or period homes. Make a feature of the charcoal by placing it against a wall in the palest of greys. Furnish the room in medium woods, dusky blues, and muted mauves, being sure to add in plenty of plush fabrics for extra comfort and style.

products.title: Nairobi, Pastel - Roman Blind
products.description: The pretty, unusual patterning of the nairobi in pastel displays a quirky style that art lovers will adore. Combining baby pinks with soft lilacs and pastel blues, adorned with attractive leopard imagery, the look is subtle yet effective. Surround the pastel with alike pastels, setting it against soft cream walls, and using the colours in the blind to accessorise throughout the room. Go for luxe, comfortable soft furnishings, making a room that you and your guests can really relax in.

products.title: Honesty, Jewel - Roman Blind
products.description: The honesty in jewel boasts an ivory cream background adorned with foliage imagery in chocolate browns, mustard yellows, and deep teals, giving a somewhat abstract air to a contemporary blind. Give the jewel pride of place in your hallway or landing, surrounding it with neutrally toned walls and warm brown toned accessories. Don't forget to add in the occasional pop of teal to add depth and colour to this neutral colour scheme.

products.title: Aretha, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: A beautiful take on a paisley pattern, the aretha range just screams sophistication. The natural mixes a light aqua turquoise with varying shades of chocolate, coffee, and oatmeal, interspersed with burnt orange accents. Use the natural to give your living room a rather grand look, setting it against golden oatmeal walls and opting for plenty of wooden furniture, and perhaps even wooden flooring too.

products.title: Aretha, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: The aretha in navy offers colour galore, blending beautiful shades of rich indigo, deep teal, bright coral, and warm fuchsia with muted tones of green, grey, and beige. The end result is bold and striking, with unforgettable colour. Use the navy as the star of the show in your living room or dining room. Surround with equally rich colours, tempering with soft creams and neutrals as needed. You'll end up with a warm and cosy room full of rich colour and character.

products.title: Abstract, Sherbert - Roman Blind
products.description: To add a burst of colour to your windows, bear in mind the abstract in sherbert. A multi-coloured canvas, in a mix of greens, pinks, and yellows, offers a stunning combination of patterning and shading. Use the sherbert to jazz up a neutral or white utility room, adding a little cheer as you enter to do your washing. Accent the blind with matching hues in your various household accessories if you can, but otherwise, this blind will stand on its own two feet just fine.

products.title: Oasis, Forest - Roman Blind
products.description: Aptly named, the oasis forest is a stunning collection of green foliage imagery, with ferns, leaves, and the occasional floral sitting resplendent in apple, forest, and teal greens. The blind has an abstract feel to it that gives it a contemporary yet artistic look. Hang the forest in a nature-themed room amidst fellow greens and turquoises, tempered with off-whites for balance. Contemporary furniture will work well, as will natural wickers and woods.

products.title: Nairobi, Ink - Roman Blind
products.description: To add some real pizazz to your windows, consider the nairobi in ink. A leopard print canvas in transparent blues and reds plays host to beautifully illustrated leopards in various poses, offering the perfect combination of colour and wildlife. Use the ink to brighten up a jaded hallway or landing. Accent with matching blues, perhaps even opting for a blue feature wall. Add the occasional animal print if you dare, for a fun and eye-catching dcor scheme your guests are unlikely to forget in a hurry.

products.title: Nairobi, Snow - Roman Blind
products.description: The nairobi in snow adds a casual sense of glamour to any room, with its chocolate animal print and beautiful sketches. The fabric contains linen, giving it lasting durability as well as that classic linen look and feel. Hang the snow amidst similar browns and creams, and consider a deep chocolate feature wall for a striking look. Add shimmering golds and plush camels for a truly luxurious style, and be sure to throw in plenty of soft fabrics for extra comfort.

products.title: Honesty, Cerise - Roman Blind
products.description: On a soft biscuit background sits a foliage pattern featuring pale oatmeals, deep pink-reds, and rich golds, occasionally interspersed with a pop of turquoise teal, and that makes up the prettily contemporary honesty cerise. This roman blind's linen feel means it will hang beautifully in any home. Give your utility room, downstairs cloakroom, or entrance hallway a spot of colour by hanging the cerise in pride of place.

products.title: Nairobi, Midnight - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring inky blues and charcoal blacks, the nairobi in midnight offers both colour and sophistication. Your home will soak up the moody charm of this boldly illustrated roman blind, and guest are sure to comment. Hang the midnight in the dining room, amidst ink-toned navy blues and golden tan browns. Include a medium toned wooden table and chairs, and perhaps consider a deep navy feature wall - if you're feeling brave.

products.title: Aretha, Red - Roman Blind
products.description: The aretha red is cheery, stylish, and contemporary, displaying pretty shades of poppy red, bright orange, and tempered teal, alongside muted greys and olive greens. This look will work in even the most modern of homes, softening hard edges with its sweet colours and flowing paint strokes. Give the red full reign of the master bedroom, allowing it to be accented by poppy red tones with the occasional hint of of teal.

products.title: Oasis, Autumn - Roman Blind
products.description: The oasis in autumn is just that - a gorgeous oasis of foliage shapes in rich autumnal tones. Deep bronze amber meets leafy and forest greens, sat on a creamy ivory base for a luxe finish. The overall look is one of pretty elegance, with an abstract feel that adds depth and character. Place the autumn in a naturally toned room, perhaps a living room or guest bedroom, amidst creams, greens, and ambers.

products.title: Fuji, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: The fuji in natural takes tropically themed imagery and applies a neutral tone to it, resulting in a prettily understated patterning that offers a moody elegance with plenty of toning to it. The blind will work beautifully in a contemporary setting. Blend the natural amidst other neutral shades of biscuit and brown in a den or guest bedroom. Keep the walls light, in a soft shade of cream, and add a hint of teal, turquoise, or aqua for extra interest and depth.

products.title: Hollihocks, Burgundy - Roman Blind
products.description: Muted shades of mauve, burgundy, mustard, and aqua make up the pretty country florals of the hollihocks in burgundy. You'll love the cottage garden feel the blind offers, yet with tempered shading, there's nothing overpowering or too rich about the colour scheme. Use the burgundy to add some country style to the living room or garden room, surrounding it with similar aqua tones and sunny yellows.

products.title: Honeycomb, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: An unusual blind with fascinating patterning, the honeycomb navy features a subtle honeycomb patterning filled with abstract daisies, all in deep navy, mustard, and white tones. You'll love the contemporary feel to this blind, blending nature with abstract in one fell swoop. Use the navy for a cosy feel to a den or sitting room, filling the room with wooden furniture and matching navy tones. Use a gentle white paint for the walls, and highlight with mustard tones in your oddments and wall art.

products.title: Harper, Rainbow - Roman Blind
products.description: With a rainbow of colour and an explosion of shades that give this offering from the harper range its name you'll be able to add something enticing and eclectic to your interior. The real depth stems from the intriguing contrast between the zesty oranges and calmer pinks. A light blue feature wall and a light brown laminate floor are great ways to introduce this symphony of colour into the living room.

products.title: Capri, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: With its pale and creamy biscuit base, adorned with grey, mint, and apple-toned florals, the capri in natural is true to its name. The abundance of green tones in this blind sit prettily on amongst the lush cream, grey, and white tones, making this a beautifully understated piece. Hang the natural in a light and airy living room or dining room, and stick to its colour scheme by surrounding it with plenty of pale, serene shades of white and cream, accenting with muted sages and the occasional forest green.

products.title: Xerxes, Ivory - Roman Blind
products.description: The unique xerxes ivory features an array of creatures in browns, biscuits, and teals, all on a patterned background of cream and matte gold. The look is absolutely inspired and, of course, unusual, so you can be sure of this attractive roman blind being a real conversation piece. Bring out the teal tone of the blind by making it your dining room's key colour. Go for a feature wall of teal, opting for creamy white on the rest of the walls.

products.title: Capri, Ecru - Roman Blind
products.description: A multi-coloured delight, the capri ecru depicts gorgeous foliage in artistic brushstrokes of icy blues, aqua greens, sunny yellows, and more. This roman blind is both pretty and refreshing, perfect for both contemporary and traditional homes. Use the ecru to add a splash or two of colour to your home office, without the distraction of anything too bold or flashy. Settle amongst white or pale grey walls and keep the furniture clean and modern, with the occasional colourful accessory for good measure.

products.title: Fuji, Ink - Roman Blind
products.description: The jaded hues of the fuji in ink suit the part-linen fabric perfectly. A rich oatmeal background plays host to muted shades of inky indigo, sky blue, and apple green, providing the tropical paradise displayed with a whole new dimension. Add the ink to a casually styled guest room and settle it amongst sandy oatmeal shades for a natural feel to accentuate the blind itself. Go for natural woods and perhaps the occasional shabby chic ornament, accenting occasionally with a deep indigo or ocean blue.

products.title: Xerxes, Moss - Roman Blind
products.description: The lively, unusual imagery of the xerxes in moss truly does speak for itself. Intriguing camel images adorn a patterned green background, making this an eye-catching piece that's sure to get you and your guests talking at your next dinner party. Hung in the dining room, the moss will make a grand statement, and will look right at home amidst dark woods and classically shaped furniture. Include matching green as your base colour, but add the occasional rich red or purple to accent.

products.title: Fuji, Verdigris - Roman Blind
products.description: With its gorgeous green tones and tropical trees, the fuji verdigris is aptly named. Though the theme is tropical, the shades are muted, giving the blind a wonderfully understated feel that will work in any home. Hang the verdigris in the downstairs cloakroom or utility to give a dusky blast of colour where it's needed most. Surround with white walls, fittings, and furniture, and add the occasional green accessory to give depth and to bring out the colours in the blind.

products.title: Astral, Ivory - Roller Blind
products.description: Take a closer look at astral ivory and you come to appreciate the subtle way in which the leaves twist and turn across the fabric. They have an elegant and timeless feel to them - one which will add depth and clarity to your decor like never before. If you want to introduce a spark of creative inspiration to the dining room, combine ivory with some dark tableware and wall art to provide a strong contrast.

products.title: Astral, Snow - Roller Blind
products.description: When you want to be able to reinvent your interiors and breathe new life into proceedings, your window spaces hold the key. Astral snow enables you to introduce a soft grey and a creamy base colour so that you have plenty of new creative avenues you could go down. It's all about simple neutral colours that subtly transform into one another when you want that relaxing homely vibe. Magnolia walls, a light stained wooden floor, and a few lamps rather than dazzling overhead lighting are all you really need to make things nice and cosy.

products.title: Astral, Jet - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of astral jet is that the neutral backdrop allows the florals to really come into their element. A crisp jet black can be hard to match to, but when it is as elegantly delivered as this, you won't be short of ways that you can make it work. Working in other patterning is a great way to turn the master bedroom into the room that allows you to rest and unwind at the end of a long day. A matching set of bed linen and some wall art opposite your windows would be worth a closer look.

products.title: Origin, Cameo - Vista Blind
products.description: Origin cameo allows your eye to see something new the closer you study the care and craft that has gone into making it. A subtly patterned voile sits harmoniously with a finely detailed fabric that we call cameo. Far more than a walk on part, the unique vista design will allow your latest addition to take centre stage as it offers control of any room in the house as you effortlessly adjust the light.

products.title: Feather, Dess - Roman Blind
products.description: The feather in dess displays pretty feathers across a beautifully refreshing aqua turquoise background, resulting in a stunningly serene roman blind with bags of charm and plenty of personality. Use the dess to complement an ice white bathroom, opting for white in everything from your bathroom suite to your tiling and floor. Add in towels and accessories in matching aqua tones to keep the look fresh and coordinated, going for silver fixtures and fittings for a modern and contemporary feel.

products.title: Feather, Dove - Roman Blind
products.description: The pretty, neutral patterning of the feather in dove showcases an understated style of dcor that will look at home in any kind of setting. Combining a pale creamy oatmeal background with a neutral grey for the illustrations, the look is subtle yet powerful. Surround the dove with alike cool neutrals, including soft cream walls, and pale grey tones to accentuate the light and airy look of the blind.

products.title: Morrison, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: Adorn your home with sophisticated style by incorporating the morrison in duck egg, which showcases a contemporary, embellished design using silky thread for a glamourous silver shimmer, and in a majestic blue with stormy grey hues for a dramatic and eye-catching finish. Opt for a modern colour scheme in the bedroom by choosing dove grey walls as the base, and using matching duck eggs and slate greys in your soft furnishings and fabrics to bring out the hues in the duck egg.

products.title: Morrison, Rosso - Roman Blind
products.description: An attractive blind that creates a middle-ground for the traditional and the contemporary, the morrison in rosso blends a gorgeous mix of burnt orange, charcoal grey, and off-white in a pretty and unique pattern. Hang the neat folds of the rosso against a burnt orange feature wall for a bright and bold yet warm and welcoming ambience in your dining room. Surround with classic furniture in polished medium woods and traditional shapes, as well as plush soft furnishings for comfort.

products.title: Morrison, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: In the morrison natural, a current and embellished design in silver-hued dove, slate, and charcoal greys, sits on a softer dusty background. The linen-look cloth with its silky thread hangs neatly into the flowing shape of the roman, giving a classical edge to this modern blind. Combine the contemporary pattern of the natural with similar arty fabrics and elegant stitchings to form a traditional style and, by continuing the stormy grey and charcoal hues in similarly toned fabrics, form a modish finish with soothing shades.

products.title: Camden, Pastel - Roman Blind
products.description: The moody, abstract blossoms of the camden pastel is offset by the bright and cheery colours it displays. Candy pinks, sunny yellows, and soft greens are just some of the pretty shades on offer, all with in natural tones to keep the look soft and subtle. Settle the sweet blossoms of the pastel in the kitchen, where happy colours are a must, and opt for oatmeal walls and apple green units for a country look.

products.title: Pavillion, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: Keep up with the latest home dcor trends by including the pavillion in grey in your home. The fashionable grey and yellow colour pairing is both stylish and fun, and offers a serene look without compromising on colour. Hang the grey in your home study for a serious yet interesting look and feel. Opt for pale grey walls and accent throughout with charcoal greys and mustard yellows. Frame yellow and grey wall art in black, and go for modern, sleek furniture.

products.title: Pavillion, Burnt Orange - Roman Blind
products.description: The pavillion in burnt orange combines a deep autumnal shade of orange with a more neutral charcoal grey, and the effect is both cosy and stylish. The somewhat geometric patterning offers a contemporary look that will work in any home. The burnt orange would be perfect for a warm and inviting den or sitting room area, where you can surround it with palest grey walls and deep shades of orange and grey in your furniture and soft furnishings.

products.title: Wind Dancer (Blackout), Marine - Roller Blind
products.description: Our new wind dancer blackout marine roller blind is the perfect way to add something playful to your home with the click of a button. The traditional way in which the design is layered allows you to add something that's a cross between retro and vintage. Creating a nautically themed nursery is the perfect way to welcome your new arrival to the family home. Take your time to get all of those small details right, and sleep easy safe in the knowledge that your window spaces are already spoken for.

products.title: Summer Trail (Blackout), Pastel - Roller Blind
products.description: The floral stylings of summer trail blackout pastel allow you to lose yourself in the sounds and sites of spring no matter what time of year it is. Just what you need when you want to create that relaxing vibe you never want to leave. Matching to pastel is all about working in some lively colours like a mint green or a sunrise yellow. Use them on your minor surfaces such as lampshades and scatter cushions, and they'll work in perfect harmony with your light wooden floor and rich creamy walls.

products.title: Summer Trail (Blackout), Blossom - Roller Blind
products.description: Blossom is one of the latest additions to their summer trail blackout range, and it adds that sought after country aesthetic to any contemporary home. The intricacy of the florals allows you to lose yourself in the moment, whilst the subtle display of colour is perfect when you want to take your decor in multiple different directions. Think about ways to introduce coppers and slate greys into your space and you'll be rewarded with a contemporary look that has an ample helping of modern chic.

products.title: Floral (Blackout), Lilac - Roller Blind
products.description: Floral blackout lilac introduces your decor to a beautiful selection of colours that will catch the eye the moment you walk through the door. The way in which the lines ebb and flow gives it a life of its own, and allows you to lose yourself in the moment as you put your feet up for the evening. Rustic wooden furniture could just be the perfect addition to your new look living room, so why not browse and shop to see what's on offer? You never know, you might even be able to repurpose something you already have by working a little bit of that shabby chic magic.

products.title: Woodland, Fennel - Roman Blind
products.description: With a beautiful portfolio of natural greens, woodland fennel instantly transports you back to the simplicity and wonder of the outdoors. The tones and shapes really bring the fabric to life and sit gently in the background as they create a harmony with the rest of your space. Simple colours are what works best with fennel. A pale blue feature wall around your windows will work wonders when paired with some magnolia partner walls.

products.title: Woodland, Saxon Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: You'll love the gorgeously abstract blue tones of the misty woodland in saxon blue. The occasional sage green and pale dove grey is there to accent, and the imagery sits on a clean white background for contrast. Add the saxon blue to a downstairs cloakroom or utility to give the room a cool hue by painting the room a soft white and accessorising with blues and greens. To go along with the woodland theme, add some foliage or wildflower wall art to boot.

products.title: Woodland, Auburn - Roman Blind
products.description: The abstract tree patterning of the woodland in auburn is both captivating and relaxing, whilst it's autumnal greens and browns give it a gorgeously cosy feel. And, on 100% cotton material, it folds beautifully into the neat folds that make the roman blind so special. Go for an autumn-themed living room by surrounding the auburn with similar green and brown colours in natural tones. Choose natural woods, jute rugs, and plenty of wools, accenting throughout with the occasional deep forest green and chocolate brown to add depth and interest.

products.title: Woodland, Rosemist - Roman Blind
products.description: This woodland inspired design brings charcoal into alignment with a portfolio of autumnal colours to give your home something to really smile about. Look closer and you'll see the artistry required to create each leafy branch as the fabric takes on a life of its own. Partnering rosemist with a light grey feature wall and dark wooden floor is an inspired way to extend its colour spectrum out into your room.

products.title: Bougainvillea, Waterfall - Roman Blind
products.description: Delicate florals take centre stage in the elegant bougainvillea waterfall, a pretty piece in muted blues and fresh apple greens. An ivory background plays host to this array of foliage, and the outcome is one of freshness and serenity. Use the waterfall to pull together a light and airy living space, where pretty blue hues take centre stage. Alternatively, darken the room with a deep blue feature wall, allowing the blind to offset the colour beautifully.
